attributes.action: Reduce council tax at the rate of reduction in services instead of increasing it
attributes.additional_details:
This is not fair on us the tax payers and is not justified.
The government must step in and stop this before we have children living in poverty and thousands more homeless people.
If this cannot be stopped then a full protest against Bradford council will be held.
attributes.background: Bradford Council's budget for the next year, which will include millions of pounds of cuts (£13.5m) to public services, yet the council tax will be increasing to its highest it’s ever been.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it's about something the UK Government or Parliament is not responsible for. This is the responsibility of your local council.
You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. 

You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: 
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors.
